code: import{createSelector}from'reselect';export var projectsState=function projectsState(state){return state&&state.projectsApp;};export var getProjects=createSelector(projectsState,function(projects){return projects.projects;});export var getLoadingState=createSelector(projectsState,function(projects){return projects.loading;});export var getShowDrawer=createSelector(projectsState,function(projects){return projects.showDrawer;});export var getShowSlideOutAnim=createSelector(projectsState,function(projects){return projects.showSlideOutAnim;});export var getPageNumber=createSelector(projectsState,function(projects){return projects.pageNumber;});export var getCurrentProject=createSelector(projectsState,function(projects){return projects.currentProject;});export var getProjectLoadingState=createSelector(projectsState,function(projects){return projects.projectLoading;});
